name: The Life of a Little Marble
name_original: The Life of a Little Marble
description:
Description - 

The Little Marble is the only one who can save the world. As it floods with lava and into destruction, he must journey through tunnels and obstacles to kill what is causing this Apocolypse!!!

Instructions - 

Dodge red blocks and continue onward to the boss then survive till he uses all his power up!!!

Controls - 

WASD or Arrow Keys - Movement
